title: Grayson Johnson’s CV
text:
Interdisciplinarian, Entrepreneur, Firefighter, EMT.

LinkedIn | My design portfolio



A senior at BYU-Idaho


Entrepreneurship and Innovation in Business - especially in apparel and design



Data science, innovation, leadership, communication, design




2015-2019 Highland Senior High School, Pocatello, ID
September 2021 - now BYU-Idaho, Rexburg, ID

Bachelor in Interdisciplinary Studies with concentration in Family Consumer Science Entrepreneurship
Minor in World Languages

Portuguese, Spanish

Certificate in Data Science




September 2022 - January 2023 All In Sports Hoop.Camp Sponsorship Intern | September, 2022 - December 2022

Generate sponsorships and donations for an international nonprofit organization from universities and companies in a sales environment
Responsibility for follow-up and accounts generated

2019 - 2021 The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints Full-Time Missionary | August, 2019 - July, 2021

Connected with individuals and families of diverse cultures, races, backgrounds, and ages
Coordinated training and communication with three teams of over twenty missionaries




2019 - present Teton County Fire and Rescue, Driggs, ID

Wildland Firefighter and Hazaardous Fuels Crew
Reserve Structre Firefighter and EMT

2025 Integrated Business Corps, BYU-Idaho

Audit and Finance TA
Lead TA
